content.question: Snow is falling at a rate of r(t)=2e-0.1t inches per hour, where t is the time in hours since the beginning of the snowfall. Which of the following expressions gives the amount of snow, in inches, that falls from time t = 0 to time t = 5 hours?

topic.text: 8.3: Using Accumulation Functions and Definite Integrals in Applied Contexts

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
